# Token reference

<Description>
  Tokens provide direct access to theme values and give you flexibility to build
  and customize your own themed components.
</Description>

## Overview

Radix Themes exposes all tokens as [CSS Custom Properties](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/--*), these are consumed internally in all styled components.

You can access them the same way you would any other variable, either directly inside your CSS or inline via the `style` prop.

### Modifying tokens

Token values can be customized by using a separate configuration stylesheet. The simplest way to do so is to create a `theme-config.css` file and ensure it is imported after the global theme styles:

```css
/* theme-config.css */
.radix-themes {
  --default-font-size: 18px;
}
```

```jsx
// app-root.jsx
import '@radix-ui/themes/styles.css';
import './themes-config.css';

import { Theme } from '@radix-ui/themes';

export default function () {
  return (
    <Theme>
      <MyApp />
    </Theme>
  );
}
```

## Tokens

For a comprehensive list of all available tokens, see their respective source files:

- [Color](https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/src/styles/tokens/color.css)
- [Radius](https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/src/styles/tokens/radius.css)
- [Shadows](https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/src/styles/tokens/shadow.css)
- [Space](https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/src/styles/tokens/space.css)
- [Typography](https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/src/styles/tokens/typography.css)
